name: COWBOY - SHOOTOUT
description:
PLAY IN THE OLD WILD WILD WEST AGAINST A FRIEND OR YOUR NEMESIS

Once you press the "Play" button, a random, invisible, timer will be set and the

countdown begins. Be very attentive, because in an INSTANT you´ll have to react

to the game´s prompt to shoot your opponent!

A key - PLAYER ONE

L key - PLAYER TWO

The first to acquire 3 stars WINS!

Note:  The game is only supported on PC - local. The game is not supported for mobile, maybe in the future I will add the feature if needed.

Music: 

Fastest Gun in the 8-bit West - OkamiDeluxe

8-Bit RPG Music - Victory Theme | Original Composition - Adam Haynes
